mapper.select: /* WorkMeasurePlanMapper.getWorkMeasurePlan [WorkMeasurePlan.xml] */ select wmp.work_meas_plan_no ,wmp.plant_cd ,plant.code_nm as plant_nm ,wmp.year ,wmp.half_year_cd ,halfYear.code_nm as half_year_nm ,wmp.meas_agency ,convert(char(10), wmp.meas_dt_sta, 23) as meas_dt_sta ,convert(char(10), wmp.meas_dt_end, 23) as meas_dt_end ,wmp.meas_plan_nm ,wmp.work_meas_state_cd ,measState.code_nm as work_meas_state_nm ,wmp.create_user_id ,wmp.create_dt ,wmp.update_user_id ,wmp.update_dt ,wmp.plan_appr_rqst_no ,wmp.rslt_appr_rqst_no ,car.biz_appr_step_cd ,bizAppr.code_nm as biz_appr_step_nm from work_meas_plan as wmp inner join com_code_master as plant on wmp.plant_cd = plant.code and plant.code_group_cd = 'COM_PLANT_CD' inner join com_code_master as halfYear on wmp.half_year_cd = halfYear.code and halfYear.code_group_cd = 'RSA_HALF_YEAR' inner join com_code_master as measState on wmp.work_meas_state_cd = measState.code and measState.code_group_cd = 'work_meas_state_cd' left outer join com_appr_rqst as car on isnull(wmp.rslt_appr_rqst_no, wmp.plan_appr_rqst_no) = car.appr_rqst_no left outer join com_code_master as bizAppr on car.biz_appr_step_cd = bizAppr.code and bizAppr.code_group_cd = 'COM_BIZ_APPR_STEP' where wmp.work_meas_plan_no = #{workMeasPlanNo}

/* WorkMeasurePlanMapper.getWorkMeasurePlanTargets [WorkMeasurePlan.xml] */ select wmpt.work_meas_plan_target_no ,wmpt.work_meas_plan_no ,wmpt.dept_cd ,cd.dept_nm ,wmpt.process_cd ,cp.process_nm ,wmpt.remark ,wmpt.create_user_id ,wmpt.create_dt ,wmpt.update_user_id ,wmpt.update_dt from work_meas_plan_target as wmpt inner join com_dept as cd on wmpt.dept_cd = cd.dept_cd inner join com_process as cp on wmpt.process_cd = cp.process_cd where wmpt.work_meas_plan_no = #{workMeasPlanNo}

/* WorkMeasurePlanMapper.getWorkMeasurePlanHazards [WorkMeasurePlan.xml] */ select wmph.work_meas_plan_target_no ,wmph.hazard_cd ,ch.hazard_nm_ko from work_meas_plan_hazard as wmph inner join com_hazard as ch on wmph.hazard_cd = ch.hazard_cd where wmph.work_meas_plan_target_no = #{workMeasPlanTargetNo}

/* WorkMeasurePlanMapper.getWorkMeasurePlanResult [WorkMeasurePlan.xml] */ select wmp.work_meas_plan_no ,wmp.plant_cd ,plant.code_nm as plant_nm ,wmp.year ,wmp.half_year_cd ,halfYear.code_nm as half_year_nm ,wmp.meas_agency ,convert(char(10), wmp.meas_dt_sta, 23) as meas_dt_sta ,convert(char(10), wmp.meas_dt_end, 23) as meas_dt_end ,wmp.meas_plan_nm ,wmp.work_meas_state_cd ,measState.code_nm as work_meas_state_nm ,wmp.create_user_id ,wmp.create_dt ,wmp.update_user_id ,wmp.update_dt ,wmp.plan_appr_rqst_no ,wmp.rslt_appr_rqst_no ,car.biz_appr_step_cd ,bizAppr.code_nm as biz_appr_step_nm from work_meas_plan as wmp inner join com_code_master as plant on wmp.plant_cd = plant.code and plant.code_group_cd = 'COM_PLANT_CD' inner join com_code_master as halfYear on wmp.half_year_cd = halfYear.code and halfYear.code_group_cd = 'RSA_HALF_YEAR' inner join com_code_master as measState on wmp.work_meas_state_cd = measState.code and measState.code_group_cd = 'work_meas_state_cd' left outer join com_appr_rqst as car on wmp.rslt_appr_rqst_no = car.appr_rqst_no left outer join com_code_master as bizAppr on car.biz_appr_step_cd = bizAppr.code and bizAppr.code_group_cd = 'COM_BIZ_APPR_STEP' where wmp.work_meas_plan_no = #{workMeasPlanNo}
